title: Apple reportedly faces pressure in India after sending out warnings of state-sponsored hacking
selftext:
I remember seeing quite the social media turmoil the day it happened, and havenâ€™t seen much else since then.

 How does such a fundamental breach of privacy goes unanswered?
comments: Which rock have you been living under that this comes as a surprise to you
Fair enough. It just seems like quiet acceptance is the norm now, very odd to see. Guess my question sounded rhetorical.
We have acquiesed by force, not by choice.
Now they'll call Apple aunty nashnul ðŸ¤¡
Phoren conspiracy to dephame Vishwaguru saaar
Nahâ€¦.acquiesced by vote collectively â€¦â€¦. We get a government that reflects our values ðŸ˜’
We don't like apple, this is a country of mangoes.
